body_html:
After I run the batch script for installing conda via https://gist.github.com/yf225/1e82a779257914503980eb589044d1c7
and then run the batch script for building pytorch via https://gist.github.com/yf225/a477d159e7ba2986ce9b9dca7782e678
I get the error that setup.py doesn't exist.

Do I need to run these scripts from the directory that I've cloned the PyTorch repo into or something? I'm not sure which setup.py file it should be referencing.

body:
After I run the batch script for installing conda via [https://gist.github.com/yf225/1e82a779257914503980eb589044d1c7](url)
and then run the batch script for building pytorch via [https://gist.github.com/yf225/a477d159e7ba2986ce9b9dca7782e678](url)
I get the error that setup.py doesn't exist. 

Do I need to run these scripts from the directory that I've cloned the PyTorch repo into or something? I'm not sure which setup.py file it should be referencing.
